snippet: The St. Louis police used pepper spray against several protesters Wednesday when they tried to rush into Police Headquarters.
abstract: St Louis police use pepper spray to disperse protesters trying to rush into Police Headquarters to protest death of Michael Brown in Ferguson, Mo.
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis police used pepper spray against several protesters Wednesday when they tried to rush into Police Headquarters.

headline.main: Missouri: Arrests at St. Louis Police Headquarters Protest
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Arrests at Police Headquarters Protest
